# fat_header

macOS 10.8+

```
struct fat_header {
    ...
};
```

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/fat_header#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/kernel/fat_header#1595893)

[`magic`](/documentation/kernel/fat_header/1558632-magic)An integer containing the value `0xCAFEBABE` in big-endian byte order format. On a big-endian host CPU, this can be validated using the constant `FAT_MAGIC`; on a little-endian host CPU, it can be validated using the constant `FAT_CIGAM`.[`nfat_arch`](/documentation/kernel/fat_header/1558629-nfat_arch)An integer specifying the number of [`fat_arch`](/documentation/kernel/fat_arch) data structures that follow. This is the number of architectures contained in this binary.
